title: I cant switch my music to the bilgewater music
body:
When in game, when I try to switch my music to the bilgewater music, I can't.
My only option is the updated music (the normal season 5 music)
the bilgewater music isnt an option
and the classic music isnt an option either
they just dont exist
how do I fix this?

replies.body:
Hey! ^__^ 

Sounds like unfortunately you're experiencing a bug that the HUD sometimes has with scrolling menus. 

Could you try one more time, with the dropdown selected (or clicked), and with your cursor hovered directly over the "Updated" option, and THEN scroll down with your mouse wheel/middle mouse button and see if the Bilgewater option appears?

Additionally, the Bilgewater music will not play in Custom Games, but if you want to try this in a custom it should play Classic music, and when you switch to a matchmade game the Bilgewater music will play. :) 

Hope this helps!

i dont have a working mouse, how would I scroll down with a laptop?

Do you play LoL with the touchpad?

You could attempt to scroll through the menu the same way you would scroll through a browser on your touchpad (I assume you do the finger-slide on the right-hand side of the touchpad), however I'm not sure if that will work :(

If that doesn't work you may need an external mouse. However, the HUD bug will be fixed in 5.15, so you will be able to click the dropdown and see all of the options at that point!
